errors.fileTooLarge: Fayiro nnene nnyo. Obunene obusinga bwe {{maxSize}}.
errors.invalidFileType: Kika kya fayiro tekituufu. Ebika ebikiriza: {{types}}.
errors.passwordTooShort: Ekigambo eky'ekyama kirina okuba n'ennukuta {{minLength}} oba ezisingawo

offline.title: Toli ku mukutu
offline.description: Ebimu ku bintu bisobola obutabawo nga toli ku mukutu.
offline.syncPending: Enkyukakyuka zijja kukwatagana nga oddayo ku mukutu

hero.title: Okugumya Abasomesa ba Uganda Okuyita mu Kwegatta
hero.subtitle: Kwegatta, okugabana ebikozesebwa, n'okukula mu buvunaanyizibwa wamu n'abasomesa abalala mu Uganda. Ofuna ebintu eby'obukulu okuva mu gavumenti n'okuzimba ebibiina by'ebyenjigiriza ebisingako amaanyi.

features.title: Buli Kintu Abasomesa Kye Beetaaga mu Mukutu Gumu
features.subtitle: Zuula ebikozesebwa eby'amaanyi ebikolebwa abasomesa ba Uganda

resourceSharing.title: Okugabana Ebikozesebwa
resourceSharing.description: Teeka, ggyayo, era ogabane ebikozesebwa by'ebyenjigiriza n'abasomesa mu Uganda yonna. Funa enteekateeka z'amasomo, ebipapula by'okukola, n'ebintu eby'amaloboozi n'ebifaananyi.

collaboration.title: Okwegatta kw'Abasomesa
collaboration.description: Kwegatta n'abasomesa abalala, yingira mu bibiina eby'amasomo ag'enjawulo, era mukole wamu ku nteekateeka z'amasomo n'enkola z'okusomesa.

governmentContent.title: Ebintu by'Obukulu okuva mu Gavumenti
governmentContent.description: Funa ebintu ebikakasiddwa okuva mu Minisitule y'Ebyenjigiriza, UNEB, ne NCDC. Sigala ng'omanyi enkyukakyuka mu ntegeka y'amasomo n'obubaka obw'obukulu.

offlineAccess.title: Okufuna nga Toli ku Mukutu
offlineAccess.description: Ggyayo ebikozesebwa okozese nga toli ku mukutu. Genda mu maaso n'okukola ne bw'omukutu gw'intaneeti gubulako oba teguli.

mobileOptimized.title: Ebikolebwa ku Ssimu
mobileOptimized.description: Enkola ey'okuddamu obulungi ekola bulungi ku ssimu, ku kompyuta entono, ne ku kompyuta. Funa ebintu byo wonna, buli kiseera.

community.title: Okuzimba Ebibiina
community.description: Zimba enkolagana ez'amakulu n'abasomesa, kwetaba mu kubuuza, era owe ku kibiina ky'abasomesa ekinyuvu.

cta.title: Weetegese Okukyusa Obumanyirivu bwo bw'Okusomesa?
cta.subtitle: Weegatte ku nkumi z'abasomesa ba Uganda abamaze okwegatta n'okugabana ebikozesebwa ku Teacher Hub.

contact.title: Tukirire Teacher Hub Support
contact.subtitle: Tuli wano okukuyamba okufuna obulungi mu bumanyirivu bwo bw'okusomesa. Tukirire n'ebibuuzo byonna oba okweraliikirira.

form.title: Tutumire Obubaka
form.name: Erinnya Lyonna
form.subject: Omulamwa
form.messagePlaceholder: Tuwa ebikwata ku kubuuza kwo oba ekizibu...

success.title: Obubaka Busindikiddwa Obulungi!
success.message: Webale okutukirira. Tujja kukuddamu mu ssaawa 24 mu nnaku z'emirimu.

help.title: Ekitongole ky'Obuyambi n'Okuwagira
help.subtitle: Zuula okuddamu ku bibuuzo ebya bulijjo era oyige engeri y'okufuna obulungi mu Teacher Hub

categories.title: Ebika by'Obuyambi
categories.mobile: Ssimu n'Okukola nga Toli ku Mukutu

help.noSearchResults: Tewali bivaamu ku kunoonya kwo. Gezaako ebigambo ebirala oba tambula mu bika.
help.noFAQs: Tewali bibuuzo bya bulijjo mu kika kino.

whatIsTeacherHub.question: Teacher Hub kye ki?
whatIsTeacherHub.answer: Teacher Hub mukutu ogujjuvu ogwakozesebwa abasomesa ba Uganda okwegatta, okugabana ebikozesebwa by'ebyenjigiriza, n'okufuna ebintu eby'obukulu okuva mu gavumenti. Guwa ebikozesebwa by'okukula mu buvunaanyizibwa, okuzimba ebibiina, n'okuddukanya ebikozesebwa.

howToRegister.question: Nnyinza ntya okwewandiisa nga musomesa?
howToRegister.answer: Okwewandiisa, nyiga 'Tandika' oba 'Kwewandiisa' era owe ebiwandiiko byo eby'okusomesa, omutwalidde ekitabo ky'okusomesa oba ebbaluwa y'emirimu. Tukakasa ebiwandiiko byonna eby'abasomesa okukakasa obwesigwa bw'omukutu.

credentialVerification.question: Okukakasa ebiwandiiko kutwala bbanga ki?
credentialVerification.answer: Okukakasa ebiwandiiko kutera okutwala ennaku 2-3 ez'emirimu. Ojja kufuna obubaka bwa email nga ebiwandiiko byo bikakasiddwa era akawunti ko kafuuse ddala.

forgotPassword.question: Neerabidde ekigambo kyange eky'ekyama. Nkikyusa ntya?
forgotPassword.answer: Nyiga 'Neerabidde Ekigambo eky'Ekyama' ku lupapula lw'okuyingira, wandiika endagiriro ya email yo, era tujja kukutumira omukutu gw'okukyusa ekigambo eky'ekyama. Goberera ebiragiro mu email okukola ekigambo eky'ekyama ekipya.

updateProfile.question: Nkyusa ntya amawulire g'ebikwata ku nze?
updateProfile.answer: Genda ku lupapula lw'Ebikwata ku Nze era nyiga 'Kyuusa Ebikwata ku Nze'. Osobola okukyusa amawulire go ag'obuntu, amasomo g'osomesa, emitendera, n'amawulire g'essomero. Jjukira okutereka enkyukakyuka zo.

privacySettings.question: Nkola ntya enteekateeka z'obwama?
privacySettings.answer: Mu nteekateeka z'Ebikwata ku Nze, osobola okufuga ani ayinza okulaba amawulire g'ebikwata ku ggwe, okukukirira, n'okulaba ebikozesebwa byo by'ogabanye. Era osobola okuddukanya okusiima kw'obubaka.

uploadResources.question: Nteeka era ngabana ntya ebikozesebwa?
uploadResources.answer: Genda ku kitundu ky'Ebikozesebwa era nyiga 'Teeka Ekintu'. Londa fayiro yo, gatteko omutwe n'ennyonnyola, londa obubonero n'ebika ebirungi, olwo oteeke. Abasomesa abalala basobola okuva baazuula era baggyeyo ebikozesebwa byo.

downloadOffline.question: Nsobola okuggyayo ebikozesebwa okozese nga toli ku mukutu?
downloadOffline.answer: Ye! Nyiga akabutto k'okuggyayo ku kintu kyonna okukitereka ku kyuma kyo. Ebikozesebwa ebiggyiddwa birabikira mu kitundu kyo eky'Ebikozesebwa Ebiggyiddwa era bisobola okukozesebwa awatali mukutu gw'intaneeti.

governmentContent.question: Nfuna ntya ebintu by'obukulu okuva mu gavumenti?
governmentContent.answer: Ebintu by'obukulu okuva mu Minisitule y'Ebyenjigiriza, UNEB, ne NCDC birabikira mu kitundu ky'Ebikozesebwa n'obubonero obw'okukakasa obw'obukulu. Osobola okusengejja ebintu by'obukulu bya gavumenti ng'okozesa ensengejja z'ebintu.

joinCommunities.question: Nnyingira ntya mu bibiina by'abasomesa?
joinCommunities.answer: Tambula mu bibiina mu kitundu ky'Ebibiina. Osobola okwegatta ku bibiina eby'amasomo ag'enjawulo, eby'ebitundu, oba eby'emitendera. Nyiga 'Yingira mu Kibiina' okwetaba mu kubuuza n'okukola wamu n'abasomesa abalala.

createCommunity.question: Nsobola okutondawo ekibiina kyange?
createCommunity.answer: Ye! Nyiga 'Tonda Ekibiina' mu kitundu ky'Ebibiina. Londa ekika ky'ekibiina, gatteko ennyonnyola n'amateeka, olwo oyite abasomesa abalala okwegatta ku kibiina kyo.

offlineAccess.question: Okufuna nga toli ku mukutu kukola kutya?
offlineAccess.answer: Ggyayo ebikozesebwa era okkirize enkola y'okukola nga toli ku mukutu mu nteekateeka zo. Puloguramu ejja kukwataganya enkyukakyuka zo ng'oddayo ku mukutu. Osobola okufuna ebintu ebiggyiddwa, okuwandiika obubaka, n'okugenda mu maaso n'okukola awatali intaneeti.

syncIssues.question: Nnina ebizibu by'okukwataganya. Nkola ki?
syncIssues.answer: Kebera omukutu gwo gw'intaneeti era gezaako okuddamu okutandika puloguramu. Bw'ebizibu bwe bigenda mu maaso, genda ku Nteekateeka > Okukwataganya era okole okukwataganya n'engalo. Kirira obuyambi singa ebizibu bigenda mu maaso.

mobileApp.question: Waliwo puloguramu ya ssimu?
mobileApp.answer: Teacher Hub ekola nga Progressive Web App (PWA) ku byuma by'essimu. Osobola okugiteeka ku ssimu yo ng'okyalira omukutu era olonda 'Gattako ku Lupapula lw'Awaka' ng'obuuziddwa.

installPWA.question: Nteeka ntya Teacher Hub ku ssimu yange?
installPWA.answer: Kyalira teacherhub.ug ku mukutu gw'essimu yo. Ojja kulaba okubuuzibwa 'Teeka Puloguramu'. Nyiga 'Teeka' okugattako Teacher Hub ku lupapula lwo lw'awaka okufuna obwangu.

quickLinks.title: Enkolagana ez'Obwangu
quickLinks.contactDesc: Funa obuyambi okuva ku ttiimu yaffe ey'obuyambi
quickLinks.registerDesc: Weegatte ku kibiina kya Teacher Hub

introduction.title: Okutandika
introduction.content: Teacher Hub yeewaddeyo okukuuma obwama bwo n'okukakasa obukuumi bw'amawulire go ag'obuntu. Enkola eno y'Obwama ennyonnyola engeri gye tukuŋŋaanyiza, gye tukozesa, gye tugabana, era gye tukuuma amawulire go ng'okozesa omukutu gwaffe.

personalInfo.title: Amawulire g'Obuntu
personalInfo.name: Erinnya lyonna n'amawulire g'okukirira
personalInfo.email: Endagiriro ya email n'ennamba ya ssimu

howWeUse.title: Engeri Gye Tukozesamu Amawulire Go
howWeUse.ensureSecurity: Okukakasa obukuumi bw'omukutu n'okuziyiza okukozesebwa obubi

withUsers.title: N'Abakozesa Abalala
withUsers.content: Amawulire g'ebikwata ku ggwe n'ebikozesebwa by'ogabanye birabikira eri abasomesa abalala abakakasiddwa ku mukutu. Osobola okufuga enteekateeka z'okulabika mu byokwagala byo eby'obwama.

withGovernment.title: N'Ebitongole bya Gavumenti
withGovernment.content: Tuyinza okugabana ebibalirirwa eby'okukozesa ebitali bya muntu ku tteka n'ebitongole by'ebyenjigiriza bya gavumenti okuyamba okulongoosa obuweereza bw'ebyenjigiriza mu Uganda.

withServiceProviders.title: N'Abawa Obuweereza
withServiceProviders.content: Tukola n'abawa obuweereza abeesigwa abatuyamba okuddukanya omukutu. Abawa obuweereza bano basibiddwa endagaano z'obwama ezikakali.

legalRequirements.title: Ebyetaagisa mu Mateeka
legalRequirements.content: Tuyinza okubikkula amawulire nga gaagaliddwa amateeka oba okukuuma eddembe, ebintu, oba obukuumi bwa Teacher Hub, abakozesa baffe, oba abalala.

dataSecurity.title: Obukuumi bw'Amawulire
dataSecurity.content: Tukola enkola z'obukuumi ezijjuvu okukuuma amawulire go:
dataSecurity.regularAudits: Okukebereza obukuumi bwa buli kiseera n'okupima
dataSecurity.staffTraining: Okutendeka abakozi ku nkola z'okukuuma amawulire

yourRights.title: Eddembe Lyo
yourRights.exerciseRights: Okukozesa eddembe lino, tukirire ku privacy@teacherhub.ug

dataRetention.title: Okutereka Amawulire
dataRetention.content: Tukuuma amawulire go okumala ekiseera ekyetaagisa okuwa obuweereza bwaffe:
dataRetention.contentData: Amawulire g'ebintu: Okumala nga bigabanye mu lujudde
dataRetention.usageData: Amawulire g'okukozesa: Okutuusa ku myaka 2 okw'ebibalirirwa
dataRetention.legalRequirements: Ebyetaagisa mu mateeka biyinza okwongera ekiseera ky'okutereka

internationalTransfers.title: Okutambuza Amawulire Ebweru w'Eggwanga
internationalTransfers.content: Amawulire go gaterekebwa mu Uganda okusinga. Bwe tutambuza amawulire ebweru w'eggwanga, tukakasa nti waliwo obukuumi obumala okukuuma amawulire go.

childrensPrivacy.title: Obwama bw'Abaana
childrensPrivacy.content: Teacher Hub yakolebwa abasomesa ab'obuvunaanyizibwa. Tetukuŋŋaanyiza mawulire g'obuntu okuva ku baana abali wansi w'emyaka 18 awatali lukusa lwa bazadde.

changes.title: Enkyukakyuka ku Nkola Eno
changes.content: Tuyinza okukyusa Enkola eno y'Obwama buli kiseera. Tujja kukumanyisa enkyukakyuka enkulu nga tuyita mu email oba obubaka bw'omukutu.

contact.title: Tukirire
contact.content: Bw'oba olina ebibuuzo ku Nkola eno y'Obwama oba enkola zaffe ez'amawulire, tukirire:

introduction.title: Okutandika
introduction.content: Tukusanyuse ku Teacher Hub. Amateeka gano g'Obuweereza gafuga okukozesa kwo omukutu gwaffe n'obuweereza. Ng'ofuna oba okozesa Teacher Hub, okkiriza okusibwa amateeka gano.

acceptance.title: Okukkiriza Amateeka
acceptance.content: Ng'otonda akawunti oba okozesa obuweereza bwaffe, okkiriza nti osomye, otegedde, era okkiriza okusibwa Amateeka gano g'Obuweereza n'Enkola yaffe y'Obwama.

eligibility.title: Obusaasi
eligibility.content: Okukozesa Teacher Hub, olina okutuukiriza ebyetaagisa bino:
eligibility.teacher: Okuba musomesa oba omukozi w'ebyenjigiriza omutendeke

registration.title: Okwewandiisa Akawunti
registration.secure: Okukuuma ebikwata ku kuyingira byo obulungi
registration.responsible: Okuvunaanyizibwa ku bikolwa byonna wansi w'akawunti ko
registration.notify: Okutumanyisa amangu nga waliwo okuyingira okutakkiriziddwa

prohibited.title: Okukozesa Okutakkiriziddwa
prohibited.illegal: Ebikolwa byonna ebitakkiriziddwa oba ebitali mu mateeka
prohibited.impersonation: Okwefuula abalala oba okuwa amawulire ag'obulimba
prohibited.malware: Okusaasaanya puloguramu embi oba esinga obukozi

userContent.title: Ebintu Abakozesa Bye Bakola
userContent.ownership: Osigala ng'oli nannyini bintu by'otonda era by'oteeka ku Teacher Hub.
userContent.license: Ng'oteeka ebintu, owa Teacher Hub olukusa okubilaga, okubisaasaanya, n'okubikozesa okuwa obuweereza bwaffe.

platformContent.title: Ebintu by'Omukutu
platformContent.ownership: Teacher Hub ye nannyini bintu byonna eby'omukutu, omutwalidde puloguramu, enkola, n'ebiwandiiko.

governmentContent.title: Ebintu bya Gavumenti
governmentContent.ownership: Ebintu bya gavumenti bisigala nga bya bitongole bya gavumenti ya Uganda.

moderation.title: Okuddukanya Ebintu
moderation.review: Okukebereza ebintu byonna abakozesa bye bakola
moderation.report: Okuloopa ebikolwa ebitali mu mateeka eri abakulu

privacy.title: Obwama n'Okukuuma Amawulire
privacy.content: Obwama bwo bwa muwendo gwaffe. Soma Enkola yaffe y'Obwama okutegeera engeri gye tukuŋŋaanyiza, gye tukozesa, era gye tukuuma amawulire go.

disclaimers.title: Okwegaana Obuvunaanyizibwa
disclaimers.content: Teacher Hub eweebwa 'nga bw'eri' awatali bukuumi bwonna. Twegaana:

liability.title: Okuziyiza Obuvunaanyizibwa
liability.content: Okumala nga amateeka bwe gakkiriza, Teacher Hub tajja kuvunaanyizibwa ku bukozi obw'omu ngeri etali butereevu, obw'okwongera, obw'enjawulo, oba obw'okuvaamu okuva ku kukozesa kwo obuweereza bwaffe.

indemnification.title: Okusasula
indemnification.content: Okkiriza okusasula era okukuuma Teacher Hub okuva ku misango gyonna, obukozi, oba ensaasaanya ezivaamu ku kukozesa kwo obuweereza bwaffe oba okumenya amateeka gano.

termination.title: Okukomekkereza
termination.content: Tuyinza okukomekkereza oba okusimba akawunti ko olw':

governingLaw.title: Amateeka Agafuga
governingLaw.content: Amateeka gano g'Obuweereza gafugibwa amateeka ga Uganda. Enkaayana yonna ejja kugonjoolwa mu mbuga z'amateeka za Uganda.

changes.title: Enkyukakyuka ku Mateeka
changes.content: Tuyinza okukyusa Amateeka gano g'Obuweereza buli kiseera. Tujja kukumanyisa enkyukakyuka enkulu era okugenda mu maaso n'okukozesa kitegeeza okukkiriza amateeka amakyusiddwa.

contact.title: Amawulire g'Okukirira
contact.content: Bw'oba olina ebibuuzo ku Mateeka gano g'Obuweereza, tukirire:

footer.description: Okugumya abasomesa ba Uganda okuyita mu kwegatta, okugabana ebikozesebwa, n'okukula mu buvunaanyizibwa. Kwegatta n'abasomesa mu ggwanga lyonna era ofune ebintu eby'obukulu okuva mu gavumenti.

introduction.title: Okutandika
introduction.content: Enkola eno ya Cookies ennyonnyola engeri Teacher Hub gye kukozesa cookies n'ebyobukugu ebirala okukukutegeera ng'okyalira omukutu gwaffe. Ennyonnyola ebyobukugu bino bye biri n'ensonga lwaki tubikozesa, awamu n'eddembe lyo ery'okufuga okukozesa kwaffe.

whatAreCookies.title: Cookies Kye Ki?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies bifaayiro entono ez'amawulire eziteekebwa ku kompyuta yo oba ku kyuma kyo eky'essimu ng'okyalira omukutu. Cookies zikozesebwa ennyo ab'omukutu okukola emikutu gyabwe okukole, oba okukola obulungi, awamu n'okuwa amawulire ag'okuloopa.

essential.title: Cookies Ezeetaagisa
essential.description: Cookies zino zetaagisa nnyo okukuwa obuweereza obuli ku mukutu gwaffe n'okukozesa ebimu ku bintu byagwo.

functional.title: Cookies ez'Obukozi
functional.description: Cookies zino zisobozesa omukutu okuwa obukozi obw'okusingawo n'okufuula bintu okw'obuntu.

analytics.title: Cookies ez'Okukebereza
analytics.description: Cookies zino zituyamba okutegeera engeri abakyalira gye bakolagana n'omukutu gwaffe nga tukuŋŋaanya era nga tuloopa amawulire mu butamanyike.

managingCookies.title: Okuddukanya Cookies
managingCookies.content: Olina eddembe okusalawo oba okkiriza oba okugaana cookies. Osobola okukozesa eddembe lyo erya cookies ng'oteeka ebyokwagala byo mu nteekateeka za browser yo.

browserSettings.title: Enteekateeka za Browser
browserSettings.chrome: Chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies and other site data
browserSettings.firefox: Firefox: Options > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data
browserSettings.safari: Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Manage Website Data
browserSettings.edge: Edge: Settings > Cookies and site permissions

platformSettings.title: Enteekateeka z'Omukutu
platformSettings.content: Era osobola okuddukanya ebyokwagala ebimu ebya cookies okuyita mu nteekateeka z'akawunti ko ku Teacher Hub.

thirdParty.title: Cookies za Bannakyewa
thirdParty.content: Okugatta ku cookies zaffe, tuyinza era okukozesa cookies ez'enjawulo eza bannakyewa okuloopa ebibalirirwa by'okukozesa n'okuwaayo ebyokulaajana.

updates.title: Okukyusa Enkola Eno
updates.content: Tuyinza okukyusa Enkola eno ya Cookies buli kiseera okwoleka enkyukakyuka mu nkola zaffe oba olw'ensonga endala ez'obukozi, ez'amateeka oba ez'ebiragiro.

contact.title: Tukirire
contact.content: Bw'oba olina ebibuuzo byonna ku kukozesa kwaffe cookies oba ebyobukugu ebirala, tukirire:

status.title: Embeera y'Enkola
status.subtitle: Embeera y'obuweereza bwa Teacher Hub mu kiseera kino

incidents.title: Ebyabaddewo mu Biseera Ebiggya
incidents.noIncidents: Tewali byabaddewo mu biseera ebiggya okuloopa. Enkola zonna zikola obulungi.

subscribe.title: Sigala ng'Omanyi
subscribe.description: Manyisibwa ku nkyukakyuka z'obuweereza n'enteekateeka z'okuddaabiriza.

accessibilityPage.title: Okuragira Okutuukiriza
accessibilityPage.subtitle: Obwewadde bwaffe okufuula Teacher Hub etuukire abasomesa bonna

commitment.title: Obwewadde Bwaffe
commitment.content: Teacher Hub yeewaddeyo okukakasa okutuukiriza kw'ebyobukugu eri abantu abalina obulemu. Tuli bulijjo nga tulongoosa obumanyirivu bw'omukozesa eri buli muntu era nga tukozesa empimpi z'okutuukiriza ezikwata okukakasa nti tuwa omukisa gw'enkana eri abakozesa bonna.

keyboard.title: Okutambula n'Ebibonero
keyboard.shortcuts: Amakubo ag'amangu ag'ebibonero ag'ebikolwa ebya bulijjo

visual.title: Okutuukiriza Okulabika
visual.colorBlind: Enkola etegeerekeka eri abo abatalaba mabala bulungi

standards.title: Okugoberera Empimpi
standards.content: Teacher Hub egezaako okugoberera Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA n'empimpi endala ez'okutuukiriza:

accessibilityPanel.title: Ekipapula ky'Okutuukiriza
accessibilityPanel.content: Funa ekipapula ky'okutuukiriza ng'onyiga akabonero k'okutuukiriza mu mutwe oba ng'okozesa omukutu gw'ebibonero Alt+A.

screenReaders.title: Okukwatagana n'Abakisoma Olutimbe
screenReaders.content: Teacher Hub ekwatagana n'abakisoma olutimbe abamanyiddwa:

knownIssues.title: Ebizibu Ebimanyiddwa
knownIssues.content: Tuli bulijjo nga tulongoosa okutuukiriza. Mu kiseera kino, tewali bizibu binene by'okutuukiriza ebimanyiddwa.
knownIssues.note: Bw'osanga ebizibu byonna eby'okutuukiriza, tukirire amangu tulyo tubigonjooze.

feedback.title: Ebirowoozo ku Kutuukiriza
feedback.content: Tusanyukira ebirowoozo byo ku kutuukiriza kwa Teacher Hub. Tutegeeze bw'osanga ebizibu by'okutuukiriza:
feedback.responseTime: Tugezaako okuddamu ebirowoozo by'okutuukiriza mu nnaku 2 ez'emirimu.

communityPage.title: Ekibiina ky'Abasomesa
communityPage.subtitle: Kwegatta n'enkumi z'abasomesa mu Uganda yonna. Gabana amagezi, mukole wamu ku pulojekiti, era mukule wamu nga kibiina ky'abavunaanyizibwa.

joinCta.title: Weegatte ku Kibiina kya Teacher Hub Leero
joinCta.subtitle: Kwegatta n'abasomesa abalala era ofune enkumi z'ebikozesebwa by'ebyenjigiriza

primaryEducation.name: Abasomesa b'Amasomero ag'Obwana
primaryEducation.description: Ekibiina ky'abasomesa b'amasomero ag'obwana okugabana enteekateeka z'amasomo, enkola z'okusomesa, n'amagezi g'okuddukanya ebibiina.

mathematics.name: Abasomesa ba Kubala
mathematics.description: Kwegatta n'abasomesa ba kubala ku mitendera gyonna. Gabana enkola z'okugonjola ebizibu, ebikozesebwa by'entegeka y'amasomo, n'enkola z'okusomesa empya.

kampala.name: Abasomesa b'Ekitundu kya Kampala
kampala.description: Ekibiina ky'omu kitundu ky'abasomesa mu kitundu kya Kampala. Tegeka enkuŋŋaana, gabana ebikozesebwa by'omu kitundu, era mukole wamu ku nteekateeka z'ekitundu.

science.name: Omukutu gw'Abasomesa ba Sayansi
science.description: Gw'abasomesa ba biology, chemistry, ne physics. Gabana obugezigezi, ebikozesebwa by'omu ddagala, era mwenyigire mu kubuuza kwa sayansi.

shareResources.title: Gabana Ebikozesebwa
shareResources.description: Teeka era oggyeyo ebikozesebwa by'ebyenjigiriza, enteekateeka z'amasomo, n'ebikozesebwa by'okusomesa ebikolebwa abasomesa abalala.

collaborate.title: Mukole Wamu
collaborate.description: Mukolere wamu ku pulojekiti, mugabane enkola z'okusomesa, era muyige okuva ku basomesa abamanyirivu mu Uganda yonna.

grow.title: Okukula mu Buvunaanyizibwa
grow.description: Mwenyigire mu kubuuza, mutendeke emikolo gy'omu mukutu, era mufune emikisa gy'okukula mu buvunaanyizibwa.

guidelines.title: Ebiragiro by'Ekibiina
guidelines.subtitle: Okukuuma embeera ennungi era ey'okukola, bannakibiina bonna basuubirwa okugoberera ebiragiro bino:
guidelines.respectful: Beera wa kitiibwa era wa buvunaanyizibwa mu nkolagana zonna
guidelines.educational: Kuuma okubuuza nga kwesigamye ku nsonga z'ebyenjigiriza
guidelines.supportive: Wagira abasomesa abalala era ojaguza obuwanguzi
guidelines.professional: Kuuma empimpi z'obuvunaanyizibwa mu nkolagana zonna

note.title: Kikulu:
note.content: Okumenya ebiragiro by'ekibiina kiyinza okuvaamu okusimba akawunti oba okuggyawo ku mukutu.

blog.title: Blog ya Teacher Hub
blog.subtitle: Amagezi, amagambo, n'emboozi okuva mu kibiina ky'ebyenjigiriza kya Uganda

digitalLiteracy.title: Okuzimba Obumanyirivu bw'Ebyobukugu mu Bibiina by'Abasomesa ba Uganda
digitalLiteracy.excerpt: Zuula enkola entuufu ez'okugatta ebyobukugu mu nkola z'okusomesa eza bulijjo n'okutegeka abayizi okw'omulembe gw'ebyobukugu.
digitalLiteracy.content: Obumanyirivu bw'ebyobukugu bufuuse bwa muwendo mu byenjigiriza bya kati. Emboozi eno enoonyereza engeri abasomesa ba Uganda gye bayinza okugatta obulungi ebyobukugu mu bibiina byabwe nga bakola mu mbeera z'ebikozesebwa ebitono.

communityBuilding.title: Amaanyi g'Ebibiina by'Abasomesa mu Kukula mu Buvunaanyizibwa
communityBuilding.excerpt: Zuula engeri okwegatta n'abasomesa abalala gye kiyinza okukyusa enkola yo ey'okusomesa n'okukula kw'omulimu gwo.
communityBuilding.content: Ebibiina by'abasomesa biwa obuwagizi obw'omuwendo, ebikozesebwa, n'emikisa gy'okukula mu buvunaanyizibwa. Yiga engeri y'okufuna obulungi mu kuyiga okw'okwegatta.

resourceSharing.title: Okugabana Ebikozesebwa Obulungi: Enkola Ennungi ez'Abasomesa
resourceSharing.excerpt: Yiga engeri y'okukola, okugabana, n'okukozesa ebikozesebwa by'ebyenjigiriza obulungi mu kibiina kya Teacher Hub.
resourceSharing.content: Okugabana ebikozesebwa kuli ku mutima gwa Teacher Hub. Ekiragiro kino kiwa enkola ennungi ez'okukola ebikozesebwa by'ebyenjigiriza eby'omutindo gwa waggulu n'okubigabana obulungi.

offlineTeaching.title: Okusomesa mu Mbeera z'Omukutu Omutono
offlineTeaching.excerpt: Enkola n'ebikozesebwa by'okusomesa obulungi nga omukutu gw'intaneeti gutono oba teguli.
offlineTeaching.content: Amasomero mangi ga Uganda gakwatibwa ebizibu by'omukutu. Emboozi eno ewa eby'okukola ebirungi okukuuma okusomesa okulungi mu mbeera z'omukutu omutono.

newsletter.title: Sigala ng'Omanyi
newsletter.subtitle: Kwewandiise ku lupapula lwaffe olw'amawulire okufuna amagezi ag'ebyenjigiriza amaggya n'amawulire g'omukutu
newsletter.privacy: Tussaamu ekitiibwa obwama bwo era tetujja kugabana endagiriro ya email yo.

comingSoon.title: Ebintu Ebisingawo Bijja
comingSoon.description: Tukola okukuletera ebintu eby'omuwendo ebisingawo okuva ku basomesa mu Uganda yonna. Ddayo bulijjo okw'emboozi empya n'amagezi.
